languages.text: "Я прикоснулся к самой скверне Архиврага, {name}. Неужели ты думал{mf||а}, что подобный опыт может быть чем-то приятным? {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Псайкеры{/g}, даже санкционированные, даже прошедшие все ритуалы и посвящения — врата для сил, враждебных Человечеству. Я выдержал непростой бой на Кьяве Гамма — почти незримый для окружающих и смертельно опасный для меня".

traits.locale_text: "Я прикоснулся к самой скверне Архиврага, {name}. Неужели ты думал{mf||а}, что подобный опыт может быть чем-то приятным? {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Псайкеры{/g}, даже санкционированные, даже прошедшие все ритуалы и посвящения — врата для сил, враждебных Человечеству. Я выдержал непростой бой на Кьяве Гамма — почти незримый для окружающих и смертельно опасный для меня".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "I touched the corruption of the Archenemy, {name}. Did you honestly think the experience could somehow be a pleasant one? {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psykers{/g}, even sanctioned ones, even those who have performed all the rituals, passed all the initiations — we are all gateways to forces hostile to Humanity. I survived a difficult battle on Kiava Gamma, one that was invisible to others and potentially fatal for myself."
languages.original_text: "Я прикоснулся к самой скверне Архиврага, {name}. Неужели ты думал{mf||а}, что подобный опыт может быть чем-то приятным? {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Псайкеры{/g}, даже санкционированные, даже прошедшие все ритуалы и посвящения — врата для сил, враждебных Человечеству. Я выдержал непростой бой на Кьяве Гамма — почти незримый для окружающих и смертельно опасный для меня".

I survived a difficult battle on Kiava Gamma, one that was invisible to others and potentially fatal for myself."

Psykers, even sanctioned ones, even those who have performed all the rituals, passed all the initiations — we are all gateways to forces hostile to Humanity. I survived a difficult battle on Kiava Gamma, one that was invisible to others and potentially fatal for myself."

traits.locale_text: "I touched the corruption of the Archenemy, {name}. Did you honestly think the experience could somehow be a pleasant one? {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Зsykerы{/g}, even sanctioned ones, even those who have performed all the rituals, passed all the initiations — we are all gateways to forces hostile to Humanity. I survived a difficult battle on Kiava Gamma, one that was invisible to others and potentially fatal for myself."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I touched the corruption of the Archenemy, {name}. Did you honestly think the experience could somehow be a pleasant one? {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psykers{/g}, even sanctioned ones, even those who have performed all the rituals, passed all the initiations — we are all gateways to forces hostile to Humanity. I survived a difficult battle on Kiava Gamma, one that was invisible to others and potentially fatal for myself."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我触碰到了混沌大敌的腐化，{name}。你真的以为这样的经历会令人感到愉快吗？对{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}而言，哪怕是那些得到授权的灵能者，哪怕是那些参加了所有仪式、通过了所有考验的灵能者，我们依然是通往人类之敌的门户。我在基亚瓦伽马星那场艰难的战斗中活了下来。那场战斗别人可能根本看不到，但对我而言，它却可能要了我的命。”
languages.original_text: "I touched the corruption of the Archenemy, {name}. Did you honestly think the experience could somehow be a pleasant one? {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psykers{/g}, even sanctioned ones, even those who have performed all the rituals, passed all the initiations — we are all gateways to forces hostile to Humanity. I survived a difficult battle on Kiava Gamma, one that was invisible to others and potentially fatal for myself."

traits.locale_text: “我触碰到了混沌大敌的腐化，{name}。你真的以为这样的经历会令人感到愉快吗？对{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}而言，哪怕是那些得到授权的灵能者，哪怕是那些参加了所有仪式、通过了所有考验的灵能者，我们依然是通往人类之敌的门户。我在基亚瓦伽马星那场艰难的战斗中活了下来。那场战斗别人可能根本看不到，但对我而言，它却可能要了我的命。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I touched the corruption of the Archenemy, . Did you honestly think the experience could somehow be a pleasant one? Psykers, even sanctioned ones, even those who have performed all the rituals, passed all the initiations — we are all gateways to forces hostile to Humanity. I survived a difficult battle on Kiava Gamma, one that was invisible to others and potentially fatal for myself."

languages.text: «He tocado la corrupción del Archienemigo, {name}. ¿De verdad cree que la experiencia podría ser placentera? Los {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquicos{/g}, incluso los autorizados, incluso aunque hayan completado todos los rituales y todas las iniciaciones, son portales a fuerzas hostiles a la Humanidad. He sobrevivido a una dura batalla en Kiava Gamma, una invisible para los demás y potencialmente letal para mí».
languages.original_text: "I touched the corruption of the Archenemy, {name}. Did you honestly think the experience could somehow be a pleasant one? {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psykers{/g}, even sanctioned ones, even those who have performed all the rituals, passed all the initiations — we are all gateways to forces hostile to Humanity. I survived a difficult battle on Kiava Gamma, one that was invisible to others and potentially fatal for myself."

traits.locale_text: «He tocado la corrupción del Archienemigo, {name}. ¿De verdad cree que la experiencia podría ser placentera? Los {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquicos{/g}, incluso los autorizados, incluso aunque hayan completado todos los rituales y todas las iniciaciones, son portales a fuerzas hostiles a la Humanidad. He sobrevivido a una dura batalla en Kiava Gamma, una invisible para los demás y potencialmente letal para mí».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「私は渾沌の勢力の腐敗に触れたことはある、{name}。その経験が楽しいものだとでも思ったのか？ {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}は、たとえ認定された者であっても、すべての儀式を行い、合格した者であっても、人類に敵対する力への入り口なのだ。私はキアヴァ・ガンマでの困難な戦いを生き延びた。他の人には見えないものかもしれないが、それは私にとって生命に関わるものだったのだ」
languages.original_text: "I touched the corruption of the Archenemy, {name}. Did you honestly think the experience could somehow be a pleasant one? {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psykers{/g}, even sanctioned ones, even those who have performed all the rituals, passed all the initiations — we are all gateways to forces hostile to Humanity. I survived a difficult battle on Kiava Gamma, one that was invisible to others and potentially fatal for myself."

traits.locale_text: 「私は渾沌の勢力の腐敗に触れたことはある、{name}。その経験が楽しいものだとでも思ったのか？ {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}は、たとえ認定された者であっても、すべての儀式を行い、合格した者であっても、人類に敵対する力への入り口なのだ。私はキアヴァ・ガンマでの困難な戦いを生き延びた。他の人には見えないものかもしれないが、それは私にとって生命に関わるものだったのだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe die Verderbtheit des Erzfeindes berührt, {name}. Dachtet Ihr wirklich, dieses Erlebnis könne in irgendeiner Art und Weise angenehm sein? {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g}, selbst sanktionierte, selbst jene, die alle Rituale ausgeführt, alle Initiationsriten bestanden haben ... wir alle sind Portale zu Mächten, die der Menschheit feindlich gesinnt sind. Ich habe auf Kiava Gamma eine schwierige Schlacht überlebt. Eine Schlacht, die für andere unsichtbar und für mich potenziell tödlich war."
languages.original_text: "I touched the corruption of the Archenemy, {name}. Did you honestly think the experience could somehow be a pleasant one? {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psykers{/g}, even sanctioned ones, even those who have performed all the rituals, passed all the initiations — we are all gateways to forces hostile to Humanity. I survived a difficult battle on Kiava Gamma, one that was invisible to others and potentially fatal for myself."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe die Verderbtheit des Erzfeindes berührt, {name}. Dachtet Ihr wirklich, dieses Erlebnis könne in irgendeiner Art und Weise angenehm sein? {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g}, selbst sanktionierte, selbst jene, die alle Rituale ausgeführt, alle Initiationsriten bestanden haben ... wir alle sind Portale zu Mächten, die der Menschheit feindlich gesinnt sind. Ich habe auf Kiava Gamma eine schwierige Schlacht überlebt. Eine Schlacht, die für andere unsichtbar und für mich potenziell tödlich war."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai touché la corruption du Grand Ennemi, {name}. Pensez-vous honnêtement que c'est une expérience plaisante ? Même s'ils ont été assermentés, ont accompli tous les rituels et réussi toutes les initiations, les {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} sont de véritables passerelles pour les ennemis de l'humanité. Sur Kiava Gamma, j'ai survécu à une bataille acharnée que nul ne pouvait voir et qui aurait pu me coûter la vie. »
languages.original_text: "I touched the corruption of the Archenemy, {name}. Did you honestly think the experience could somehow be a pleasant one? {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psykers{/g}, even sanctioned ones, even those who have performed all the rituals, passed all the initiations — we are all gateways to forces hostile to Humanity. I survived a difficult battle on Kiava Gamma, one that was invisible to others and potentially fatal for myself."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai touché la corruption du Grand Ennemi, {name}. Pensez-vous honnêtement que c'est une expérience plaisante ? Même s'ils ont été assermentés, ont accompli tous les rituels et réussi toutes les initiations, les {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} sont de véritables passerelles pour les ennemis de l'humanité. Sur Kiava Gamma, j'ai survécu à une bataille acharnée que nul ne pouvait voir et qui aurait pu me coûter la vie. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Şerbaşı'nın yozluğuna dokundum {name}. Güllük gülistanlık bir deneyim olacağını mı sandın? {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Ruhsezerler{/g} onaylı da olsa, tüm ayinleri tamamlamış da olsa, tüm sınavlardan geçmiş de olsa... İnsanlığa düşman kuvvetlere açılan birer kapıdır. Kiava Gama'da çok çetin bir savaş verdim. Başkalarının görmediği, yok oluşun eşiğine geldiğim bir savaş."
languages.original_text: "I touched the corruption of the Archenemy, {name}. Did you honestly think the experience could somehow be a pleasant one? {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psykers{/g}, even sanctioned ones, even those who have performed all the rituals, passed all the initiations — we are all gateways to forces hostile to Humanity. I survived a difficult battle on Kiava Gamma, one that was invisible to others and potentially fatal for myself."

traits.locale_text: "Şerbaşı'nın yozluğuna dokundum {name}. Güllük gülistanlık bir deneyim olacağını mı sandın? {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Ruhsezerler{/g} onaylı da olsa, tüm ritüelleri tamamlamış da olsa, tüm sınavlardan geçmiş de olsa... İnsanlığa düşman kuvvetlere açılan birer kapıdır. Kiava Gama'da çok çetin bir savaş verdim. Başkalarının görmediği, beni ise neredeyse yok edecek bir savaş."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
